fullStackMern.title: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN Stack
fullStackMern.description: Building comprehensive web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: Designing and developing responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js and SCSS.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.description: Creating and managing server-side logic and databases using Node.js and Express.js for scalable applications.

api.title: RESTful API Development
api.description: Designing and developing RESTful APIs for seamless integration between different systems.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: Designing, optimizing, and managing databases using MongoDB to ensure performance and security.

deployment.title: Deployment & Hosting
deployment.description: Deploying and hosting applications on platforms like Vercel and Heroku, ensuring stable and secure operations.

android.title: Android Development with Flutter
android.description: Designing and developing fully functional Android applications using Flutter with a focus on modern design and user experience.

firebase.title: Firebase Integration
firebase.description: Integrating Firebase services into Android apps for features like authentication, real-time databases, and push notifications.

apiMobile.title: API Integration
apiMobile.description: Connecting Android apps to external APIs to enable seamless data interaction and extend app functionality.
